I'd like sugest Firefox create a botom to acces "Favorites" when the display is in F11 mode and the "Menu" bar is hiden. I explain: in netbooks the display is very small, so we ever use the display in F11 mode, but sometimes we need to acces the "Favorites" in the Menu bar; this wold can be create a a fix botm or insering "Favorites" in a menu context using the left botom of the mouse.
Thank you for the atemption and excuse my bad english. 

Reproducible: Always
